Interface Enchantment


  • public interface Enchantment
    Enchantment interface
    Author:
    Chris (damagefilter), Jason (darkdiplomat)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  Enchantment.Type
      Type - used to identify enchantments

    • Method Detail

      • getWeight

        int getWeight()
        Get weight of this enchantment
        Returns:
        The weight of the enchantment (priority level)

      • getMinEnchantmentLevel

        int getMinEnchantmentLevel()
        Get the smallest valid level this enchantment can have
        Returns:
        the minimum level this enchantment can have (will be integer 1-5)

      • getMaxEnchantmentLevel

        int getMaxEnchantmentLevel()
        Get the maximum level this enchantment can have
        Returns:
        the maximum level this enchantment can have (will be integer 1-5)

      • getMinEnchantability

        int getMinEnchantability()
        Returns the minimal value of enchantability needed on the enchantment level passed.
        Returns:
        the enchantability

      • getMaxEnchantability

        int getMaxEnchantability()
        Returns the maximum value of enchantability needed on the enchantment level passed.
        Returns:
        the enchantability

      • getDamageModifier

        int getDamageModifier(DamageSource source)
        Calculates the damage protection of the enchantment based on level and damage source passed.
        Parameters:
        source - the damage source
        Returns:
        damage modifier

      • getDamageModifier

        float getDamageModifier(EntityLiving entity)
        Calculates the damage done by this enchantment to the given EntityLiving
        Parameters:
        entity - the EntityLiving to calculate damage done to.
        Returns:
        Damage value that would be done to this entity.

      • canStack

        boolean canStack(Enchantment other)
        Check if this enchantment can stack with another one
        Parameters:
        other - Enchantment to check.
        Returns:
        true - this is a stackable enchantment
        false - this is not a stackable enchantment

      • canEnchantItem

        boolean canEnchantItem(Item item)
        Checks if the Enchantment can be applied to the Item
        Parameters:
        item - the Item to test
        Returns:
        true if can be applied; false if not

      • getType

        Enchantment.Type getType()
        Get this Enchantment's Type
        Returns:
        The Enchantment.Type of this Enchantment.

      • getLevel

        short getLevel()
        Get the level of this enchantment
        Returns:
        A value of 1 - 5. Varies by Enchantment type.

      • setLevel

        void setLevel(short level)
        Sets the level of this enchantment
        Parameters:
        level - the level to set

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Checks if the level of the Enchantment is within the min and max range
        Returns:
        true if valid; false if not
